name: The Broken Machine (abbasazzam419)
description:
Try to help the glitched machine by taking control over it and cleaning it from viruses!! You got several levels you should complete at last to set the machine free from harmful viruses. Good Luck cleaning the machine! Oh I forgot to tell you also..... it isn't easy. 

-Avoid harming the machine

-Use your brain solving some puzzles

-Enjoy the experience!

Developed and programmed by Abbas Azzam

Internet network vector created by rawpixel.com - www.freepik.com

https://www.freepik.com/vectors/internet-network
